title: Near major public transit and buslines! Great for commuters!
posting_body: ['The Covington Apartments - A place to call home!', 'Bed: 1 / Bath: 1', 'Sq.', 'Footage: 886 sq ft', 'Rent: $1710 - $1730/Month', 'Terms: 3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month, 16-Month', 'show contact info', 'At The Covington we offer studio, one and two bedroom apartments that are bright, open, and modern.', 'Each of our units has grand nine-foot ceilings, beautiful plank flooring, private balconies, and oversized windows that capture the surrounding views.', "You're sure to enjoy the community amenities that make our property stand out from the crowd.", 'Our rooftop patio has a convenient grilling station and a luxurious pool where you can relax and unwind.', 'Reserve and enjoy our theater room or bocce court for a memorable Friday night with friends, or work out in our first-rate fitness center to stay in shape.', 'Our Apartment Homes Feature:', '❖ 9 Foot Ceilings', '❖ Floor to Ceiling Windows', '❖ Microwave', '❖ Nature and City Views', '❖ Oversized Windows', '❖ Sliding Glass Doors', '❖ Smoke Free', '❖ Sprinkler System', '❖ Stainless Steel Energy Efficient Appliances', '❖ Walk-In Closets', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '❖ Bike Storage', '❖ Cardio Machines', '❖ Fire Pits', '❖ Free Weights', '❖ Guest Apartment', '❖ Pond', '❖ Pool', '❖ Recycling', '❖ Rooftop Lounge', '❖ Weight Machines', '❖ 24-Hour Fitness Center', '❖ Corporate Suites', '❖ Maintenance on Site', '❖ Massages Offered', '❖ Package Deliver to Apartment', '❖ Planned Social Activities', '❖ Video Surveillance/Patrol', '❖ Wake Up With Weidner Continental Breakfast', '❖ Welcoming Lobby Areas', '❖ Yoga Classes Offered', 'Contact Info:', 'show contact info', '5800 American Blvd W', 'Bloomington, MN 55437', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Mon - Thu: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Fri - Sat: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Pets:', 'Pet Friendly - Max 2 allowed, One time Fee $300.00, Rent $40.00, Deposit $200.00, Breed Restrictions Apply.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '1D242E293A9B479']
